title: ŠAMPON ZA POŠKODOVANE LASE BEAUTY KISS, 300ML

product-info.opis: BEAUTY KISS šampon vrača poškodovanim lasem vlago in vitalnost. Blaga in bogata nega s pšeničnimi proteini, izvlečkom mandljevih cvetov in pantenolom (provitamin B5) daje lasem voljnost in zdrav lesk.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium chloride, coco-glucoside, glycerin, panthenol, poliquaternium-10, hydrolyzed wheat protein, niacinamide, prunus amygdalus dulcis flower extract, citric acid, styrene/acrylates copolymer, parfum, sodium benzoate.
